pageContext.claim: “Look, I’ve been given a very tough hand. Because I came up here, we had an economy that was going down. We had an Iran problem. We had a Middle East problem. Take a look at what was going on in the Middle East. It's a lot better now.”
pageContext.analysis: The economy was doing well when Trump came into office. It has continued to follow the same upward trend line. Trump's actions have not changed the volatile status quo in Iran or the Middle East.
